Title....: Hamlet
IMDb......: http://imdblight.com/id/aEUCeXpyNkNifXQE-Hamlet
Genre....: Drama
Year.....: 1948
Rating...: 7.9/10 with 2,621 ratings
Plot.....: In this film of the classic Shakespearean play, a Danish prince seeks to avenge his father's death when his uncle murders his father, succeeds him as King, and marries the Queen. Along the way, Hamlet spurns his girlfriend, scolds his mother, contemplates suicide, and kills some folks.
Runtime..: 155 minutes
Filmed in: UK
Language.: English
